subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: {{Han simp|漢}} (elimination of right component to <small>{{l|zh|又}}</small>) in the 1956 {{w|Chinese Character Simplification Scheme}} by the People's Republic of China. Not known to have existed prior to that. <!-- Refer https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/漢字簡化方案 -->
